text: Benedikt Mikhailovich Sarnov (; 4 January 1927 - 20 April 2014) was a Russian literary critic, historian of Soviet literature, and writer. He graduated from Gorky Institute of World Literature in 1951. He became a member of Union of Soviet Writers in 1960. He was born in Moscow, Russian SFSR of the Soviet Union. Sarnov died on 20 April 2014 in Moscow, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Benedikt Sarnov at the Wilson Center website Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Literary critics Category:Russian historians Category:Writers from Moscow
title: Benedikt Sarnov
